title: Life in Cold Blood - s01e03 - Dragons Of The Dry (BBC TV 1)
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Life in Cold Blood - 3/5 - Dragons of the Dry

Mon 18 Feb, 9:00 pm - 10:00 pm

Website: <a href=" http://www.bbc.co.uk/sn/tvradio/programmes/lifeincoldblood/index.shtml" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.bbc.co.uk/sn/tvradio/programmes/lifeincoldblood/index.shtml</a>

David Attenborough meets lizards and comes face to face with a monitor lizard that stands on tiptoe, is flashed at by anole lizards and uses a rod and line to tempt a timid skink out of its burrow. Other scaly stars include jacky lizards that wave, wrestling beaded lizards and the largest chameleons in the world jousting in the trees. He also encounters the world&#039;s smallest chameleon no bigger than his thumb nail and the biggest lizard in Australia as he traces their colonisation of the earth to become the Dragons of the Dry.
